sentence.Network_en: Once we fall, however slightly, into immoderation, momentum gathers and we can be lost to whim.
sentence.Network_cn: 一旦我们失去节制, 不管多么轻微, 惯性便形成了, 我们就有可能在奇想中迷失.

immoderate 泛化, immoderation 不适度, immoderate 过分的

list.abs: Pediatric simple obesity is mostly caused by immoderate diet and unhealthy living habit ., 儿童单纯性肥胖症大多是因不合理饮食及不良生活习惯导致的.

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being excessive and lacking in moderation

auth_sentence.content: She spent much of her career chastening Hollywood's excesses while brushing off complaints about immoderation on her own part.
